==Detailed Show Notes==

Topics covered<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2021/8/26/episode-590-august-24-2021 Episode #590: August 24, 2021]</ref>:

*Alex spends a lot of time talking about clips from Bill Maher's show and a recent CNN interview with Brett Favre
*Alex misrepresents issues related to proposed [https://www.cdc.gov/media/releases/2021/s0818-covid-19-booster-shots.html Covid vaccine boosters]
*Alex cherry-picks a [https://www.forbes.com/sites/roberthart/2021/07/23/pfizer-shot-just-39-effective-against-delta-infection-but-largely-prevents-severe-illness-israel-study-suggests/?sh=548f36a6584f month old article] about Covid vaccine efficacy
*Alex claims that most people deliver children by C-section. [https://www.theatlantic.com/ideas/archive/2019/10/c-section-rate-high/600172/ This is not true].
*Alex claims that most people do not breastfeed. [https://www.cdc.gov/breastfeeding/data/reportcard.htm This is not true].
*[https://investor.regeneron.com/index.php/news-releases/news-release-details/regeneron-announces-us-government-agreement-purchase-additional Regeneron themselves admit] that there were some side-effects recorded in their trials
*FL Gov. DeSantis has some [https://www.tcpalm.com/story/news/local/2021/08/24/what-to-know-regeneron-clinic-monoclonal-antibody-treatment-covid-desantis-fort-pierce/8254784002/ suspicious financial ties] to a hedge fund with heavy investment in Regeneron
*Regeneron was [https://www.cnn.com/world/live-news/coronavirus-pandemic-07-07-20-intl/h_5ea1d11bcd09fec62c4d9bc32cd07b7f awarded a $450 million contract] to produce their cocktail, and reached an agreement to [https://investor.regeneron.com/index.php/news-releases/news-release-details/regeneron-announces-us-government-agreement-purchase-additional sell the federal government all their product] for over $2 billion
*Alex claims that "[[Globalists|the Globalists]]" eat "vats of poop." This is just not medically possible
*Alex fearmongers about [https://www.jpost.com/israel-news/everything-you-need-to-know-about-israels-green-passport-program-659437 news about Israel's green passports]
*Alex defends himself against accusations that he called [[Donald Trump|Trump]] a dumbass by explaining that he was trying to imply that Trump is an evil traitor
*Sean Brooks does not understand [https://www.insidehighered.com/sites/default/server_files/media/indiana_lawsuit.pdf the Indiana University lawsuit], which was [https://www.supremecourt.gov/search.aspx?filename=%2Fdocket%2Fdocketfiles%2Fhtml%2Fpublic%2F21a15.html rejected] to be heard by the Supreme Court
*Sean Brooks seems like a person who has undisclosed reasons for his opposition to public education, like [https://data.tallahassee.com/troubled-teachers/charlotte/brooks-sean-mccalla/15-0142-RT/ his history of disciplinary violations] from back when he was a teacher (h/t [https://heavy.com/news/dr-sean-brooks-phd-oxford-ohio-video/ Heavy])
